General.Name: Evli Pankki Oyj
General.Description: Evli Oyj operates as an asset manager that offers investment and asset management services in Finland. The company operates through two segments, the Wealth Management and Investor Clients; and Advisory and Corporate Clients. Its products and services include private banking and digital wealth management services, institutional asset management, public and private market funds, and capital markets services; corporate finance comprising financial advisor in financial arrangements for listed and unlisted companies; and research services to small and mid-sized listed companies, as well as planning and administration of compensation and incentive plans for listed and unlisted companies. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.
